mapper.select: SELECT e.empNo, name, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, tel, email, TO_CHAR(enterDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') enterDate, d.dCode, d.dType, p.pCode, p.pType, employeeNum FROM employee e JOIN history h ON e.empNo = h.empNo JOIN career c ON c.empNo = h.empNo JOIN dept d ON d.dCode = h.dCode JOIN position p ON p.pCode = h.pCode WHERE ( name >= #{kor} AND name < #{kor2} ) ORDER BY employeeNum DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY

SELECT NVL(COUNT(employeeNum),0) FROM employee e JOIN history h ON e.empNo = h.empNo JOIN position p ON p.pCode = h.pCode JOIN dept d ON d.dCode = h.dCode JOIN career c ON c.empNo = e.empNo
